title: How to check the background applications which are running?
answer:
Press and hold power key to open the HID options. You can view the list of six applications that have been used recently by selecting task list. Then you can touch the application icon to open the desired application.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924161649245001.png)
